ygData.subject: URI Canonicalization Rules problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have a problem implementing the URI Canonicalization Rule described here: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/URI+Canonicalization+Rules

Subject: URI Canonicalization Rules problem
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=496150545; y=L5NiKYQZDu3JMt-8UFNt3WMDheLzQX6whNIAsN2wCW6GigFNvLAENLx9UIsbAymK3SWnZnmfqU2HbtE

X-eGroups-Approved-By: nlevitt <nlevitt@...> via web; 30 Aug 2011 19:35:45 -0000

Hi,

I have a problem implementing the URI Canonicalization Rule described =
here: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/URI+Canonicalizatio=
n+Rules

When I implement it on Heritrix Engine 3.1.0-SNAPSHOT-20110721.001=
335 like it is described in the documentation the IllegalStateException I c=
opied below will be thrown as soon as I try to build my job.

The exception=
 will be thrown when this line appears in the canonicalizationPolicySheet b=
ean: 
<entry key=3D'preparer.canonicalizationPolicy' value=3D'altCanonicali=
zationPolicy'/>

It seems like it doesnt matter what i write inside the alt=
caonicalizationPolicy bean. Just the fact that I try to use it throws an ex=
ception.

Does anyone have an idea what might be the problem? Im searching =
two days now but cant find anything.

Thanks in advance,
Markus
